Translations.Text: Ni jianguo ba ziji de siyu dang shenling chongbai de ren ma? An la mingzhi er shi ta mi wu, fengbile ta de tingjue he xin [siwei], bing zai ta de yan shang mengle yi ceng mo. Zai an la zhihou, shei hai neng yindao ta ne? Nandao nimen hai bu juewu ma?
Tamen shuo:“Chule women jinshi de shenghuo wai, zai mei bie dele, women si, women sheng, zhiyou shiguang [zhu] neng huimie women.” Tamen dui ci [fuhuo] hao wuzhishi, tamen zhishi wang cai.
Dang youren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, tamen de zhenglun zhishi shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe,[xianzai] nimen jiu ba women [yi gu] de zuxian zhaohui lai [fuhuo] ba!”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la shi nimen sheng, ranhou you shi nimen siwang, zuihou, ta jiang zai wuyi de fuhuo ri jihe nimen, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.”
Tiandi de zhuquan dou shi an la de. Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, zai na ri, zhuisui miuwu zhe bi sunshi.

[Zai na ri] ni jiang kanjian mei ge minzu dou shi quxi de, mei ge minzu dou bei zhao qu kan ziji de gongguo bu.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Jintian, nimen jiang yin nimen [zai chenshi] suo zuo de er shou baochou.”
Zhe shi wo sheli de gongguo bu, ta jiang ju shi shuo gei nimen, wo [de tianshimen] yi ba nimen suo zuo de jilu xialai.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen de zhujiang shi tamen jinru ta de enhui zhong. Zhe que shi mingxian de chenggong.
Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe,[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nandao meiyouren xiang nimen songduguo wo de qishi ma? Dan nimen jiao'ao zi da, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong [zhu].”

Dang you ren [dui nimen] shuo “an la de xunuo que shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shijian que shi wuyi de” shi, nimen queshuo:“Women bu zhidao fuhuo de shijian shi shenme, women renwei na zhishi caixiang, women bing bu zhenxin.”
